Now Playing

How the Quds Force Extended Iran’s Influence in the Region

Maj. Gen. Qassem Soleimani, who was killed in a U.S. drone strike on Jan. 3, was the commander of Iran’s Quds Force. WSJ explains how this arm of Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps was formed and the role it has played in the U.S.-Iran conflict.
